attributes.comment:
Re: docket # USCIS-2006-0044 of U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services

Adoption is expensive enough already, and it is unconscionable to
raise fees by up to 66% for adoption-related petitions! It's 4 years since we
adopted our 2nd daughter, we're still paying off the expenses while incurring more
to get both daughters' Certificate of Citizenship! If the fees go up for this
Certificate, I would have to finance the applications because for 2 children, this
piece of paper would be over $800!!!! This amount of money on top of all the
money adoptive parents put out is outrageous!!! Please don't do this to people
who just want to have a family like everyone who can deliver a baby at a hospital,
with insurance coverage and maternity leave from work. We experience enough
pain emotionally and financially, please don't add to our financial burden just to
have the joy of parenthood.

I am also curious why the fees would be going up and why to the numbers
proposed?

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Gail Miller
